title: Chinese Stocks Imploded. It’s Too Early to Buy the Dip.
sub_head: Shares—particularly overseas-listed ones—are getting pummeled for good reason. Investors are better off steering clear for now.
body:
Chinese stocks are facing a perfect storm of Omicron, geopolitics and regulatory blowback.
A short-term bounce might be possible given how historically cheap the market looks now. But without some ebbing of those three fundamental headwinds, it is hard to make a case for a structural rebound.
